attributes.additional_details: Christchurch & East Dorset Council announced that due to withdrawing funding for tourism specific services, the Wimborne Tourist Information Centre would close at the end of November 2013. As the centre is a vital part of the community in Wimborne, not just for Tourists but for Residents as well, we cannot see this invaluable service close.

rejection.details: One for the Local Authority to decide on, not the Government.
